ConnectionArn.description:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the connection. The ARN is used as the connection reference when the connection is shared between AWS services .

> The ARN is never reused if the connection is deleted.

ConnectionStatus.description: The current status of the connection.

OwnerAccountId.description: The identifier of the external provider where your third-party code repository is configured. For Bitbucket, this is the account ID of the owner of the Bitbucket repository.

description:
A resource that is used to connect third-party source providers with services like CodePipeline.

Note: A connection created through AWS CloudFormation , the CLI, or the SDK is in `PENDING` status by default. You can make its status `AVAILABLE` by updating the connection in the console.

ConnectionName.description: The name of the connection. Connection names must be unique in an AWS account .

HostArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the host associated with the connection.

ProviderType.description: The name of the external provider where your third-party code repository is configured.

Tags.description: Specifies the tags applied to a connection.
